features.featureTitle: Update the global Tailwind/CSS theme tokens in `frontend/src/index.css` so the application background renders as bright_red across the entire app in both the default/light theme (`:root`) and the dark theme (`.dark`) by adjusting the OKLCH CSS variable values for `--background` and any dependent surface/contrast tokens needed to keep text and cards readable, while keeping `body` styled via `@apply bg-background text-foreground`.
